backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing storage, authorization, health checks, user profiles, and Binance account management with access-controlled mutations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor data to a new format, mainly normalizing user profile email fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing responsibilities and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color systems and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app defining routes, layout, authentication gating, initialization flow, and page mounting.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Login gate showing product marketing, feature cards, and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for collecting and saving initial user profile data including name, email, and default trading status.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with sidebar navigation, trading controls, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/system/AppInitGa: Gate that blocks rendering until backend and identity initialization succeeds, showing errors or retry options.
frontend/src/components/system/AsyncStat: Reusable wrapper for loading, error, and empty states when fetching async data.
frontend/src/components/system/HealthSta: Displays system health alerts when backend reports degraded, maintenance, or failure states.
frontend/src/components/system/RouteErro: Fallback UI for route-level rendering errors with reload and navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/system/StartupDi: Dialog showing detailed startup diagnostics including identity status, backend actor state, system health, and profile fetch results.
frontend/src/components/trading/BinanceC: UI card for connecting, verifying, and disconnecting a Binance account using API keys and query mutations.
frontend/src/components/trading/LiveTrad: Confirmation dialog requiring a typed phrase before enabling live trading.
frontend/src/components/trading/TradingM: Displays the current trading mode with an icon and description based on the user profile.
Dropdown for switching trading modes with a confirmation step for enabling live trading.
frontend/src/features/backtests/Backtest: Static UI showing planned backtest configuration sections with placeholder values and a notice about unimplemented backend storage.
Placeholder page showing planned backtest results sections and metrics with an alert about missing backend support.
frontend/src/features/backtests/RunBackt: Placeholder UI describing future functionality for starting and tracking backtest runs.
frontend/src/features/datasets/datasetPa: Parses CSV or JSON files into Candle objects with validation, supporting timestamp normalization and detailed error reporting.
frontend/src/features/datasets/DatasetsP: UI for listing datasets and uploading new ones, including form handling, validation, and calling dataset upload/parse functions.
frontend/src/features/episodes/EpisodeRe: Placeholder UI for reviewing flagged episodes with alert indicating backend support is not implemented.
frontend/src/features/metrics/MetricsPag: Static metrics dashboard and alerts describing not-yet-implemented backend metric calculations.
frontend/src/features/prompts/PromptLibr: UI for managing prompt templates, including seeding defaults, creating new templates, and copying content.
frontend/src/features/prompts/promptSeed: Defines default prompt templates for analysis, tuning, and orchestration with sample inputs/outputs.
frontend/src/features/trading/TradingHis: Renders a trade history view with mock trades, symbol and time‑range filters, and computed P&L using AsyncState and UI components.
frontend/src/features/trading/TradingOrd: Provides order placement and open‑order management with mock data, form handling, and mode‑aware toast notifications.
frontend/src/features/trading/TradingPor: Displays mock portfolio balances and open positions with summary cards and AsyncState handling.
frontend/src/features/trading/TradingSaf: Implements safety controls including kill switch, risk limits, and Binance connection card with toast‑based feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorStatus.ts: Exposes actor readiness status, extracts initialization errors, and provides a retry function that invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context for login, identity loading, and status tracking using AuthClient with customizable options.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes including chart and sidebar colors.
frontend/src/lib/canisterValueNormalizer: Provides functions to normalize HealthStatus and TradingMode values from strings or Motoko-style variants.
frontend/src/lib/queries.ts: Implements React Query hooks for user profiles, system health, datasets, prompt templates, and related canister interactions.
frontend/src/lib/queryUtils.ts: Offers helpers for request timeouts and consistent error normalization for canister/agent errors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up React root, InternetIdentityProvider, and React Query client, then renders the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters and session-persisted values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and plugins using the app’s CSS variable palette.
project_state.json: Describes project state, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for the Futures Lab trading system.
